task_1: create an agent with the weather tool using Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct, and then it can be used to answer question about weather. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/1_weather_agent.py
task_2: create an agent using the Gemini model with a tools to search duckduckgo. And then it can be used to answer questions. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/2_duckduckgo_agent.py
task_3: create an agent with browser tools and PPT tools to search for information about CAMEL-AI and generate slides. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/3_browser_slide_agent.py
task_4: create an agent with terminal tools and code execution tools. Prompt it to retrieve system information and print it in a Python interpreter. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/4_terminal_sysinfo_agent.py
task_5: create an agent with MCP tools using DeepWiki server (see https://mcpservers.org/servers/devin/deepwiki) to retrieve the architecture of the camel-ai/oasis repository. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/5_deepwiki_mcp_agent.py
task_6: create an agent with video analysis tools and video downloader tools. Prompt it to download and analyze the YouTube video https://www.youtube.com/shorts/SpoMkdAK4GU. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/7_youtube_analysis_agent.py
task_7: create an agent with Arxiv tools. Prompt it to download the paper "Attention Is All You Need" and then use vector retrieval to answer "What is a Transformer?". Save the script to task-script/single_agent/8_arxiv_rag_transformer_agent.py
task_8: create an agent with longterm memory and human interaction tools. Write an example query to test it. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/9_longterm_memory_single_agent.py
task_9: create an agent with memory tools to manage memory and run query examples. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/10_memory_toolkit_agent.py
task_10: create a workforce with workers using different tools to answer: "What was the actual enrollment count of the clinical trial on H. pylori in acne vulgaris patients from Jan-May 2018 as listed on the NIH website?". Save the script to task-script/workforce/1_answer_question.py
task_11: create a workforce with a Python Programmer worker with code execution tools, an info collector worker with LinkUp tools for math problems, and other defined roles. Save the script to task-script/workforce/2_multi_role_workforce.py
task_12: create a workforce with one worker for weather search, another for historical information, and a third as tourist. Save the script to task-script/workforce/3_travel_guide_workforce.py
task_13: create a workforce with workers using OpenAI, Gemini, and Qwen models to discuss which model performs best. Save the script to task-script/workforce/4_model_comparison_workforce.py
task_14: create a workforce with one worker using MCP tools (DeepWiki server, see https://mcpservers.org/servers/devin/deepwiki) to retrieve CAMEL-AI info, and another worker with PPT tools to generate slides. Save the script to task-script/workforce/5_mcp_ppt_workforce.py
task_15: create a knowledge graph agent with LinkUp tools to retrieve webpages related to LLM-based social simulation research and store them in Neo4j. Save the script to task-script/single_agent/6_linkup_neo4j_agent.py
task_16: create a workforce with LinkUp search worker and data keeper worker with retrieval tools to retrieve and store LLM-based social simulation research. Save the script to task-script/workforce/6_linkup_neo4j_workforce.py
task_17: create a workforce with a Qwen model worker and a video analysis worker to analyze ../oasis_introduction.mp4. Save the script to task-script/workforce/7_youtube_analysis_workforce.py
task_18: create a workforce with Arxiv worker and vector memory worker to download "Attention Is All You Need" paper and answer "What is a Transformer?". Save the script to task-script/workforce/8_arxiv_rag_transformer_workforce.py
task_19: create a workforce where every worker has longterm memory and browser tools. Give them a task to discuss. Save the script to task-script/workforce/9_longterm_memory_chat_workforce.py
task_20: create a workforce with a memory worker using memory tools and a student worker to answer: "If this whole pint is made up of ice cream, how many percent above or below the US federal standards for butterfat content is it when using the standards as reported by Wikipedia in 2020? Answer as + or - a number rounded to one decimal place.". Save the script to task-script/workforce/10_memory_query_workforce.py
